H0.text: Which mime artist is associated with the character Bip. Jean-Gaspard Deburau

H1.text: Which mime artist is associated with the character Bip. Charlie Chaplin

H2.text: Which mime artist is associated with the character Bip. Jacques Lecoq

H3.text: Which mime artist is associated with the character Bip. Marcel Marco

A4.text: In 1947 Marceau created Bip the Clown, whom he first played at the Théâtre de Poche (Pocket Theatre) in Paris.

A5.text: Marcel Marceau (French: [maʁsɛl maʁso]; born Marcel Mangel; 22 March 1923 – 22 September 2007) was a French mime artist and actor most famous for his stage persona, 'Bip the Clown'.

A6.text: Rob Mermin was a former student of Marceau

A7.text: Marcel Marceau has a profile on IMDb

A8.text: Bip became Marcel Marceau's alter ego.
